name: OI Conditioner for Softness and Shine
about: What it is:A softening conditioner that gives hair extraordinary body and shine while accelerating the drying process and protecting against heat damage..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Hydrates and protects hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Roucou Oil: Protects and strengthens hair with beta-carotene and antioxidants..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan..What Else You Need to Know:This conditioner is infused with roucou oil, apricot butter, and a cellulose conditioning agent. Also known as annatto, roucou is a plant native to the Amazon. Its seeds yield an oil rich in carotenoids. These protective antioxidants work to reduce damage caused by external aggressors, keeping your hair looking and feeling its best.
ingredients: -Roucou Oil: Protects and strengthens hair with beta-carotene and antioxidants...Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Panthenol, Phenylpropyldimethylsiloxysilicate, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum/Fragrance, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Dimethiconol, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopherol, Citronellol, Bixa Orellana Seed Oil.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing with OI Shampoo for Softness and Shine (sold separately), apply evenly to damp hair from lengths to tips..-Leave in for two to three minutes, then rinse thoroughly. .-Follow with OI Oil or All In One Hair Milk for Softness and Shine (each sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have thicker, wavy textured hair (2b, 2c). It’s also very long. I think this would be better suited for finer hair. It felt nice while in the shower, but it just didn’t give the conditioning my thicker hair really needs. Left my hair dry. It was lightweight though, left no residue. The smell is also a bit strong. Smells like laundry, which isn’t exactly what I want my hair to smell like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my hair super soft and manageable. I would rate it 5 stars but I can’t stand the smell. I’m using the jar bc it was so expensive but I can’t wait for it to be over. Legit smells like fabuloso floor cleaner

This product left my hair feeling super soft and silky looking. I personally don’t love the smell of this product so I won’t buy again based on that but my hair did feel really nice even after the first use
